title: National Classic logo
content:
Would it be possible for someone to identify the type of font used in the words:

National

Classic

...in the attached file?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140518074037im_/http:/typophile.com/files/09NatClassicLogo_3873.jpg)
author: Thrasher

comments.content: Yeah, the Classics looks more like a normal copperplate, but National is probably manually condensed.

I thought designers were refusing to use Copperplate Gothic? I guess some folks haven't gotten the message yet.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/57858](http://web.archive.org/web/20140518074037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/57858)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20140518074037/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
